scripts.gitpod: doppler run --token $(gp env | grep DOPPLER_TOKEN | cut -d '=' -f 2) -- npm start
scripts.ngrok-install: wget https://bin.equinox.io/c/4VmDzA7iaHb/ngrok-stable-linux-amd64.zip && unzip ngrok*.zip && mv ngrok ./node_modules/.bin/ && rm ngrok*.zip
scripts.ngrok-auth: echo -n 'ngrok authtoken: ' && read -s authtoken && ngrok authtoken $authtoken
scripts.ngrok-setup: npm run ngrok-install && npm run ngrok-auth && npm run ngrok-tunnel

events.restart: npm run lint && npm run prettier
